species.name: paras
descriptions: A PARAS has parasitic tochukaso mushrooms growing on its back. They grow by drawing nutrients from the host. They are valued as a medicine for long life.
As its body grows, large mushrooms named tochukaso start sprouting out of its back.
Burrows to suck tree roots. The mushrooms on its back grow by drawing nutrients from the bug host.
Burrows under the ground to gnaw on tree roots. The mushrooms on its back absorb most of the nutrition.
It is doused with mushroom spores when it is born. As its body grows, mushrooms sprout from its back.

abilities.name: effect-spore
abilities.effect: Has a 30% chance of inflcting either paralysis, poison, or sleep on attacking Pokémon on contact.

abilities.name: dry-skin
abilities.effect: Causes 1/8 max HP in damage each turn during strong sunlight, but heals for 1/8 max HP during rain.  Increases damage from fire moves to 1.25×, but absorbs water moves, healing for 1/4 max HP.

abilities.name: damp
abilities.effect: Prevents self destruct, explosion, and aftermath from working while the Pokémon is in battle.
